params.potId: ID of the pot to allow participants in

params.entryAmount: Amount required to enter the pot
params.isPublic: Whether the pot is public or private
params.maxParticipants: Maximum number of participants (0 for unlimited)
params.name: Name of the pot (bytes)
params.periodSeconds: Duration of each round in seconds (minimum 1 hour)
params.token: Address of the ERC20 token used for entry

endPot(uint256).details: This can only be called after the pot's deadline has passed and all participants have won i.e. a non winner doesnt join the current round.

params.potId: ID of the pot to end

joinOnBehalf(uint256,address).details: This can only be called if the participant is allowed to join the pot and has already joined the previous round.

params.participant: Address of the participant to join on behalf of
params.potId: ID of the pot to join
ID of the pot to join
ID of the pot to request access to

params._flatFee: Fixed fee (wei) to create a pot

params.potId: ID of the pot to trigger payout for

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

allowParticipants(uint256,address[]).notice: Pot creator can add allowed participants

createPot(bytes,address,uint256,uint8,ui.notice: Create a new pot with the specified parameters.

endPot(uint256).notice: End a pot and distribute remaining funds to all participants.

joinOnBehalf(uint256,address).notice: Join a pot on behalf of another participant.

joinPot(uint256).notice: Join a pot for the current round.

platformFee().notice: Fixed fee (wei) to create a pot

requestPotAllow(uint256).notice: Request to be allowed to join a private pot

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

setFees(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the platform and participant fees

setTreasury(address).notice: Set the treasury address where fees are sent

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

triggerPotPayout(uint256).notice: Trigger the payout for the current round of a pot.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw all ETH from the contract to the treasury
